name: The Night Of The Snowman
description:
A story haunts Snow City. Every year on Christmas Eve a snowman appears and takes away 7 victims in less than 9 minutes.

Controlling the snowman, you have the difficult mission to find 7 random people on the map and keep the old tradition!

To capture your victims you have to stun them with snowballs. Use the left mouse button to throw the snowballs and the W,A,S,D keys to move.
